# attributedSubstring(from:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an attributed string consisting of the characters and attributes within the specified range in the attributed string.

## Declaration

```swift
func attributedSubstring(from range: NSRange) -> NSAttributedString
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The range from which to create a new attributed string. `aRange` must lie within the bounds of the receiver.

## Return Value

An `NSAttributedString` object consisting of the characters and attributes within `aRange` in the receiver.

## Discussion

Raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/rangeException] if any part of `aRange` lies beyond the end of the receiver’s characters. This method treats the length of the string as a valid range value that returns an empty string.

## Getting the characters

- **string**: The character contents of the attributed string as a string.
- **length**: The length of the attributed string.
